messages.content: Dear Voter, Most people locally and nationally oppose HS2 but the other parties support it. UKIP would scrap it. UKIP speak up for people whom politicians aren't listening. Many people are unhappy about the EU, don't support foreign wars and worry about immigration. UKIP is the ONLY party that thinks that living standards are falling, and doubt is wrong, foreign aid does any good. Please vote for UKIP on May 7th.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP wants a FAIRER Australian-style points-based system to decide who comes to work and settle here.
UKIP will invest £3 billion a year EXTRA into the NHS taken from £55 million a day EU membership fee.
UKIP will SCRAP income tax on the minimum wage, SCRAP the bedroom tax, and SCRAP the tax on childhood when you die.
By stopping our EU membership and clawing back the £30 million a day spent on foreign aid, UKIP is the ONLY PARTY with money to spend at home.

issues.brexitEurope: UKIP wants a FAIRER Australian-style points-based system to decide who comes to work and settle here. By stopping our EU membership
issues.economy: UKIP will SCRAP income tax on the minimum wage

issues.immigration: Many people worry about immigration. UKIP wants a FAIRER Australian-style points-based system to decide who comes to work and settle here.
issues.socialWelfare: UKIP will SCRAP income tax on the minimum wage, SCRAP the bedroom tax

images.caption: ALAN STEVENS in Chesham and Amersham Standing Up for Real Change
